display_long_description:
🚧 Cibus Odyssey will continue to receive updates!
We're planning to introduce new main maps and mini-games over time, so stay tuned and look forward to what’s coming!

👯‍Cibus Odyssey is even more fun when played together!
In the lobby, tap Create Room to invite your friends and enjoy the game as a team.
If you're playing solo, tap Quick Start to join a room with other players who are already waiting.

---

Cibus Odyssey is a thrilling party board game in VR where strategy meets action. Compete on the main map by collecting two treasures or defeating your rivals three times. Use your sled's map and camera to plan your moves and make the most of your items to gain the upper hand. Between rounds, dive into fast-paced mini-games to earn valuable resources — cash, ammo, and power-ups — all of which give you a competitive edge in the main game. Perform well, and you might just become the 'Chosen One' who saves the continent of Cibus!

Welcome to Cibus, a once-thriving continent where diverse culinary regions flourished in harmony. But peace was shattered when a sinister force emerged from Dairy, corrupting the land and plunging Cibus into chaos. 

As fear and mistrust drive regions into isolation, a few brave souls rise to restore balance. In this savory VR adventure, embark on a journey to unravel the mystery, unite divided lands, and reclaim the lost flavors of Cibus. The fate of this world—and its cuisine—rests in your hands!
